OBI:0001573.label: DNA sequence data
OBI:0001573.definition: A sequence data item that is about the primary structure of DNA

OBI:0002578.label: adapter sequence data
OBI:0002578.definition: Nucleotide sequences of molecules that are ligated to assay samples prior to sequencing of these samples;  these sequences are provided by assay kit manufacturers and typically used to combine sequencing of multiple samples in one assay run.

OBI:0002579.label: adapter-trimmed sequence data
OBI:0002579.definition: The results of a data transformation of sequence data in which reference subsequences corresponding to ligated library adapters are removed.

OBI:0002580.label: aligned sequence data
OBI:0002580.definition: The results of a sequence alignment.

OBI:0002581.label: merged aligned sequence data
OBI:0002581.definition: The results of a data transformation of sequence data in which files containing aligned sequence data are merged together

OBI:0002569.label: trimmed sequence data
OBI:0002569.definition: The results of a data transformation of sequence data in which (e.g., low quality) read bases are removed, to achieve some specific objective.

OBI:0001110.label: real-time PCR machine
OBI:0001110.definition: An PCR instrument that enables both detection and quantification of one or more specific sequences in a DNA sample.

OBI:0001498.label: atmosphere
OBI:0001498.definition: A growth environment pertaining to the atmospheric conditions that is used to culture or grow an organism.

OBI:0001031.label: array image creation
OBI:0001031.definition: An image creation process that generate an image from the array.

OBI:0001051.label: DNA extract
OBI:0001051.definition: The output of an extraction process in which DNA molecules are purified in order to exclude DNA from organellas.

OBI:0000880.label: RNA extract
OBI:0000880.definition: an extract which is the output of an extraction process in which RNA molecules are isolated from a specimen.

OBI:0001016.label: DNASE 1 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001016.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution deoxyribonucleic acid structure mapping assay which uses DNAse 1 as reagent and enzymatic probe to generate data and information at nucleotide resolution scale contributing to the determination of nucleic acid secondary structure
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using DNAse I

OBI:0001035.label: Nuclease S1 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001035.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution deoxyribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using DNAse 1 as reagent and enzymatic probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Nuclease S1

OBI:0001019.label: RNA ADA I RNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001019.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using RNA adenosine deaminase I as reagent and enzymatic probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNA adenosine deaminase I

OBI:0001005.label: RNASE CL3 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001005.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using RNAse CL3 as reagent and enzymatic probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNAse CL3

OBI:0001030.label: RNASE T1 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001030.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale uses RNAse T1 as reagent and enzymatic probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNAse T1

OBI:0001021.label: RNASE T2 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001021.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using RNAse T2 as reagent and enzymatic probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNAse T2

OBI:0001024.label: RNASE U2 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001024.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using RNAase U2 as reagent and enzymatic probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNAse U2

OBI:0001012.label: RNASE V1 structure mapping assay
OBI:0001012.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using RNAse V1 as reagent and enzymatic probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using RNAse V1

OBI:0002032.label: parallel analysis of RNA structure assay
OBI:0002032.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that performs simultaneous in vitro profiling of the secondary structure of thousands of RNA species at single nucleotide resolution using enzymatic probing based on deep sequencing fragments of RNAs that were treated with structure-specific enzymes

OBI:0001006.label: CMCT structure mapping assay
OBI:0001006.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay which uses CMCT as reagent and chemical probe to generate data and information at nucleotide resolution scale contributing to the determination of nucleic acid secondary structure
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using CMCT probe

OBI:0000897.label: DEPC structure mapping assay
OBI:0000897.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay which determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using DEPC as reagent and chemical probe

OBI:0001015.label: DMS structure mapping assay
OBI:0001015.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay which determins nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using DMS as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using DMS probe

OBI:0001011.label: ENU structure mapping assay
OBI:0001011.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines the secondary structure of a nucleic acid at the nucleotide resolution scale which uses ENU as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using ENU probe

OBI:0001023.label: Fe-BABE RNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001023.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using Fe-BABE as reagent and chemical probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Fe-BABE probe

OBI:0001020.label: Lead structure mapping assay
OBI:0001020.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at nucleotide resolution scale using lead as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Lead probe

OBI:0001008.label: MPE-Fe(II) structure mapping assay
OBI:0001008.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at the nucleotide resolution scale using Fe-MP as reagent and chemical probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Fe-MP probe

OBI:0001026.label: NMIA RNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001026.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at the nucleotide resolution scale using NMIA as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using NMIA probe

OBI:0001029.label: OH-radical structure mapping assay
OBI:0001029.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay hat determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using hydroxyl radical as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using OH-radical probe

OBI:0001018.label: Rhodium DNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001018.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using Rhodium as reagent and chemical probe.
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Rhodium probe

OBI:0001038.label: Ruthenium structure mapping assay
OBI:0001038.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using Rhutenium as reagent and chemical probe

OBI:0001027.label: Terbium RNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001027.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at a nucleotide resolution scale using Terbium as reagent and chemical probe
alternative_term: single nucleotide resolution mapping assay using Terbium probe

OBI:0001039.label: inline probing RNA structure mapping assay
OBI:0001039.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution ribonucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at nucleotide resolution scale using intromolecular reactivity

OBI:0001013.label: kethoxal structure mapping assay
OBI:0001013.definition: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that determines nucleic acid secondary structure at nucleotide resolution scale using kethoxal as reagent and chemical probe

OBI:0400065.label: light source
OBI:0400065.definition: A light source is an optical subsystem that provides light for use in a distant area using a delivery system (e.g., fiber optics). Light sources may include one of a variety of lamps (e.g., xenon, halogen, mercury). Most light sources are operated from line power, but some may be powered from batteries. They are mostly used in endoscopic, microscopic, and other examination and/or in surgical procedures. The light source is part of the optical subsystem. In a flow cytometer the light source directs high intensity light at particles at the interrogation point. The light source in a flow cytometer is usually a laser.

OBI:0400121.label: molecular crosslinker
OBI:0400121.definition: a device that is able to chemically join two or more molecules.

OBI:0400109.label: homogenizer
OBI:0400109.definition: A homogenizer is an instrument for the homogenization of various types of material, such as tissue, plant, food, soil, and many others.

OBI:0400085.label: piezo electric crystal
OBI:0400085.definition: Apparatus in the fluidic subsystem of sorters that vibrates to break up the stream coming out of the flow chamber into droplets for sorting. The peizo electric crystal vibrates in a manner that breaks off droplets at regular intervals. Not all droplets contain a cell.

OBI:0400114.label: sonicator
OBI:0400114.definition: A device that converts a variable electrical current to mechanical vibration of a metallic probe. The device is used for the lysis of cells, the mixing of compounds or solutions, to framgent molecules of DNA, or to create emulsions.

OBI:0400118.label: vortexer
OBI:0400118.definition: A vortexer is an instrument that mixes small vials of liquid by creating a rotation of the liquid around its own center. It consists of an electric motor with the drive shaft oriented vertically and attached to a cupped rubber piece mounted slightly off-center. As the motor runs the rubber piece oscillates rapidly in a circular motion. When a test tube or other appropriate container is pressed into the rubber cup (or touched to its edge) the motion is transmitted to the liquid inside and a vortex is created.

OBI:0001112.label: autoclave
OBI:0001112.definition: A device that is used to sterilize equipment and supplies by subjecting them to high pressure steam at 121 C or more, typically for 15 to 20 minutes depending on the size of the load and the contents.

OBI:0001131.label: slide warmer
OBI:0001131.definition: A device that is used to heat microscope slides.

OBI:0400108.label: heating block
OBI:0400108.definition: A heating block is an instrument or part of an instrument which raises or maintains the temperature of a sample to a defined constant temperature during certain parts of an assay

OBI:0000834.label: high molecular weight DNA extract
OBI:0000834.definition: The output of an extraction process in which DNA molecules above a molecular weight cutoff are purified in order to exclude DNA from organellas.

OBI:0001134.label: agarose gel electrophoresis system
OBI:0001134.definition: A gel electrophoresis system that is used to separate DNA or RNA molecules by size, achieved by moving negatively charged nucleic acid molecules through an agarose matrix with an electric field.

OBI:0001132.label: capillary electrophoresis instrument
OBI:0001132.definition: An electrophoresis system that is used to separate ionic species by their charge and frictional forces and mass.

OBI:0001121.label: gel electrophoresis system
OBI:0001121.definition: A device that moves charged particles through a medium by using an electric field induced by electrodes.

OBI:0001059.label: ELISA microplate reader
OBI:0001059.definition: A microplate reader that is used for enzyme-linked immunosorbent assays (ELISA).

OBI:0001090.label: multimode microplate reader
OBI:0001090.definition: A microplate reader that can detect multiple types of absorbance, luminescence or fluorescence.

OBI:0002192.label: Leica Peloris rapid tissue processor
OBI:0002192.definition: An automatic tissue processor that is a dual retort tissue processor manufactured by the Leica company to provide fast, high quality tissue processing for histology laboratories.

OBI:0001125.label: laser scanning confocal microscope
OBI:0001125.definition: A confocal microscope that obtains high-resolution optical images with depth selectivity, in which a laser beam passes through a light source aperture and then is focused by an objective lens into a small (ideally diffraction limited) focal volume within or on the surface of a specimen.

OBI:0001071.label: programmable array microscope
OBI:0001071.definition: A confocal microscope that uses a programmable spatial light modulator for generating an arbitrary pattern of conjugate illumination and detection apertures.

OBI:0001055.label: spinning-disk confocal microscope
OBI:0001055.definition: A confocal microscope that uses a Nipkow disk, a mechanical, geometrically operating image scanning device.

OBI:0001115.label: ELISA microplate washer
OBI:0001115.definition: A microplate washer that is used for enzyme-linked immunosorbent assays (ELISA).

OBI:0001117.label: DNA extraction/purification instrument
OBI:0001117.definition: A device that is used to isolate and collect DNA for subsequent molecular analysis.

OBI:0001050.label: RNA extraction/purification instrument
OBI:0001050.definition: A device that is used to isolate and collect RNA for subsequent molecular analysis.

OBI:0001083.label: multichannel electronic pipette
OBI:0001083.definition: A multichannel pipette that can be programmed by the user to aspirate a volume of liquid reagent or sample and dispense the aspirated volume or a series of aliquots in successive dispensing operations.

OBI:0001106.label: pulsed-field gel electrophoresis system
OBI:0001106.definition: A gel electrophoresis system that is used to separate very large molecules of DNA.

OBI:0001101.label: electronic repeater pipette
OBI:0001101.definition: A micropipette that can be programmed by the user to aspirate a volume of liquid reagent or sample and dispense a series of aliquots in successive dispensing operations.

OBI:0001104.label: analytical balance
OBI:0001104.definition: A balance with weighing pan(s) inside a transparent enclosure that is used to measure mass to a very high degree of precision and accuracy.

OBI:0001091.label: mechanical balance
OBI:0001091.definition: A balance that is used to compare the weights of two bodies, to determine the difference in mass (or weight).

OBI:0001066.label: top loading balance
OBI:0001066.definition: A balance that consists of a metal plate on which to place an object and a digital readout of the measurement of its mass.

OBI:0001057.label: high performance liquid chromatography instrument
OBI:0001057.definition: A liquid chromatography instrument that consists of a reservoir of mobile phase, a pump, an injector, a separation column, and a detector. The pump (rather than gravity) provides the higher pressure required to propel the mobile phase and analyte through the densely packed column.

OBI:0000908.label: labeled DNA extract
OBI:0000908.definition: a labeled specimen that is the output of a labeling process and has grain labeled DNA to be able to detect DNA in future experiments.

OBI:0000921.label: labeled RNA extract
OBI:0000921.definition: a labeled specimen that is the output of a labeling process and has grain labeled RNA to be able to detect RNA in future experiments.

OBI:0001603.label: binding off rate measurement datum (koff)
OBI:0001603.definition: A rate measurement datum of how quickly bound complexes disassociate

OBI:0001605.label: binding on rate measurement datum (kon)
OBI:0001605.definition: A rate measurement datum of how quickly bound complexes form

OBI:0001548.label: equilibrium association constant (KA)
OBI:0001548.definition: A binding constant defined as the ratio of koff over kon (off-rate of binding divided by on-rate)

OBI:0001536.label: equilibrium dissociation constant (KD)
OBI:0001536.definition: A binding constant defined as the ratio of kon over koff (on-rate of binding divided by off-rate)

OBI:0001581.label: equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) approximated by EC50
OBI:0001581.definition: A measurement of an EC50 value under specific assay conditions approximates KD, namely the binding reaction is at an equilibrium,  and the concentration of the receptor must be much less than the KD for the ligand.

OBI:0001571.label: equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) approximated by IC50
OBI:0001571.definition: A measurement of an IC50 value under specific assay conditions approximates KD, namely the binding reaction is at an equilibrium, there is a single population of sites on the receptor that competitor and ligand are binding to, and the concentration of the receptor must be much less than the KD for the competitor and the ligand.  In this case, according to Cheng and Prussoff, KD = IC50 / (1 + Lstot / KDs), in which Lstot is the total concentration of the labeled competitor and KDs is the KD value of that competitor.

OBI:0001583.label: half life of binding datum
OBI:0001583.definition: A half life datum of the time it takes for 50% of bound complexes in an ensemble to disassociate in absence of re-association.

OBI:0002050.label: 3D structure determining assay of a MHC:ligand complex
OBI:0002050.definition: A MHC:ligand binding assay that uses a 3D structure determination of bound complex assay.

OBI:0001680.label: Sos-recruitment assay
OBI:0001680.definition: A binding assay that detects interacting proteins for a targeted domain where mammalian guanyl nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) Sos is recruited to the Saccharomyces cerevisiae plasma membrane harboring a temperature-sensitive Ras GEF, Cdc25-2, allowing growth at the nonpermissive temperature using the Sos recruitment system, a kind of yeast 2 hybrid system.

OBI:0001025.label: binding constant determination assay
OBI:0001025.definition: A binding assay where the specified output is a binding constant

OBI:0002107.label: bio-layer interferometry assay
OBI:0002107.definition: A binding assay that detects a shift in the interference pattern reflected from a layer of immobilized material on the biosensor tip to measure binding to- or dissociating from the material on the biosensor.

OBI:0001634.label: calorimetric binding assay
OBI:0001634.definition: A binding assay in which the heat generated or absorbed during a binding event is measured, which allows determination of binding constants, reaction stoichiometry, enthalpy and entropy.

OBI:0001593.label: competitive inhibition of binding assay
OBI:0001593.definition: A binding assay that detects the inhibition of binding between 2 material entities known to form a complex by the addition of a third material entity of interest. Inhibition of binding between the 2 materials reflects binding by the third material.

OBI:0001591.label: direct binding assay
OBI:0001591.definition: A binding assay that measures the formation or disassociation of a complex of 2 material entities directly without use of a competitve ligand.

OBI:0001671.label: electrophoretic mobility shift assay
OBI:0001671.definition: An assay that measures information about Protein-DNA or Protein-RNA interactions using gel electrophoresis and relying on the fact the molecular interactions will cause the heterodimer to be retarded on the gel when compared to controls corresponding to protein extract alone and protein extract + neutral nucleic acid.

OBI:0001669.label: far-Western blot assay
OBI:0001669.definition: An assay that measures protein-protein interactions by separating target proteins on an SDS-PAGE gel, transfering them to a solid substrate, hybridizing with a protein probe and visualizing bound proteins using a probe-directed antibody. This is a adaptation on the western blot assay.

OBI:0001499.label: fluorescence detection binding assay
OBI:0001499.definition: A binding assay that uses fluorescence detection as an indicator of binding

OBI:0001979.label: fluorescence quenching binding assay
OBI:0001979.definition: A binding assay in which the proximity of two entities is monitored by measuring a fluorescent signal of one of the entities that gets reduced if the two entities are cliose to each other.

OBI:0002164.label: mammalian 2-hybrid assay
OBI:0002164.definition: A binding assay that increases the expression of a reporter gene in mammalian cells by proteins of interest attached to two portions of the transcriptional activator, bringing those portions closer together.

OBI:0001476.label: phage display binding assay
OBI:0001476.definition: A binding assay in which a collection of phages expressing a library of different peptides or protein fragnments is used to infect cells, followed by screening for cells that bind a protein of interest, and identifiying the sequence of infecting phages to determine a suitable binding partner.

OBI:0001491.label: radioactivity detection binding assay
OBI:0001491.definition: A binding assay that uses radioactivity detection as an indicator of binding.

OBI:0001668.label: split-ubiquitin assay
OBI:0001668.definition: A binding assay that screens membrane soluble proteins by fusion of two integral membrane proteins (bait and prey) to two different ubiquitin moieties. One moiety is also fused to a transcription factor (TF) that can be cleaved off by ubiquitin specific proteases. Upon bait and prey interaction, Nub and Cub-moieties assemble, reconstituting the split-ubiquitin. The reconstituted split-ubiquitin molecule is recognized by ubiquitin specific proteases, which cleave off the reporter protein, allowing it to induce the transcription of reporter genes.

OBI:0000923.label: surface plasmon resonance binding assay
OBI:0000923.definition: A binding assay that uses the detection of electromagnetic waves in a surface to detect material entities adsorbed to the surface, which change the local optical index of refraction.

OBI:0002161.label: systematic evolution of ligands by exponential enrichment assay
OBI:0002161.definition: A binding assay that identifies protein-binding sites on nucleic acids by selecting high-affinity target ligands from a randomized pool. The process is repeated in rounds, then the bound nucleic acids are separated from the unbound nucleic acids and amplified by PCR._

OBI:0000291.label: transcription factor binding site assay
OBI:0000291.definition: An assay tthat determines DNA regions specifically recognized by proteins that function as transcription factors

OBI:0001679.label: yeast 2-hybrid assay
OBI:0001679.definition: An assay that detects protein protein interactions and protein DNA interactions by testing for physical interactions (such as binding) between two proteins or a single protein and a DNA molecule, respectively. The premise behind the test is the activation of downstream reporter gene(s) by the binding of a transcription factor onto an upstream activating sequence (UAS). For two-hybrid screening, the transcription factor is split into two separate fragments, called the binding domain (BD) and activating domain (AD). The BD is the domain responsible for binding to the UAS and the AD is the domain responsible for the activation of transcription. The Y2H is thus a protein-fragment complementation assay.

OBI:0001681.label: yeast one-hybrid assay
OBI:0001681.definition: An assay that determines protein DNA interactions using a single fusion protein in which the activating domain is linked directly to the binding domain.

OBI:0302859.label: genetically modified organism
OBI:0302859.definition: an organism that is the output of a genetic transformation process

OBI:0600060.label: DNA transfection
OBI:0600060.definition: a transfection which relies on the use of physical, electrical and chemical phenomena to introduce DNA into a cell

OBI:0001525.label: PDB file
OBI:0001525.definition: A 3d structural organization datum capturing the results of X-ray crystallography or NMR experiment that is formatted as specified by the Protein Databank (http://www.wwpdb.org/docs.html). A PDB file can describe the structure of multiple molecules, each of which has a different chain identifier assigned.

OBI:0001596.label: PDB file chain
OBI:0001596.definition: A 3D structural organization datum that is part of a PDB file and has a specific chain identifier that identifies the entire information on a subset of the material entities

OBI:0002465.label: age since culture seeding measurement datum
OBI:0002465.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of a cell since cultured (the process of seeding cells onto a culture dish).

OBI:0002396.label: age when gave birth to first child
OBI:0002396.definition: An age measurement datum performed on a female when her first biological child was born.

OBI:0001169.label: age since birth measurement datum
OBI:0001169.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since birth, the process of emergence and separation of offspring from the mother.

OBI:0001165.label: age since coitus measurement datum
OBI:0001165.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since coitus, the process of copulation that occurs during the process of sexual reproduction.

OBI:0001163.label: age since eclosion measurement datum
OBI:0001163.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since eclosion, the process of emergence of an adult insect from its pupa or cocoon.

OBI:0001159.label: age since egg laying measurement datum
OBI:0001159.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since egg laying, the process of the production of egg(s) by an organism.

OBI:0001168.label: age since fertilization measurement datum
OBI:0001168.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since fertilization, the process of the union of gametes of opposite sexes during the process of sexual reproduction to form a zygote.

OBI:0001161.label: age since germination measurement datum
OBI:0001161.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since germination, the process consisting of physiological and developmental changes by a seed, spore, pollen grain (microspore), or zygote that occur after release from dormancy, and encompassing events prior to and including the first visible indications of growth.

OBI:0001157.label: age since hatching measurement datum
OBI:0001157.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since hatching, the process of emergence from an egg.

OBI:0001156.label: age since planting measurement datum
OBI:0001156.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since planting, the process of placing a plant in media (e.g. soil) to allow it to grow, which excludes sowing.

OBI:0001164.label: age since sowing measurement datum
OBI:0001164.definition: An age measurement datum that is the result of the measurement of the age of an organism since sowing, the process of placing a seed or spore in some media with the intention to invoke germination.

OBI:0001551.label: access service
OBI:0001551.definition: A service in which a service consumer receives the right to use a resource (instrument, database, software, etc) that is owned or managed by a service provider.  Ownership of the accessed resource remains with the service provider during and after provision of service.

OBI:0001530.label: data service
OBI:0001530.definition: A service that has some information content entity as input and output.

OBI:0001528.label: material service
OBI:0001528.definition: A service which has a material entity as specified input and/or specified output.

OBI:0001527.label: support service
OBI:0001527.definition: A service  in which the service provider assists the consumer in activities directly or indirectly associated with the production and analysis of experimental research data.

OBI:0001538.label: training service
OBI:0001538.definition: A service  in which the service provider offers educational materials or events, such as courses, workshops or graduate programs, to the service consumer.

OBI:0001192.label: epitope specific immune intervention
OBI:0001192.definition: An administration in vivo to either actively or passively immunize an organism in order to induce a response against a specific immune epitope

OBI:0001188.label: epitope disease exacerbation experiment
OBI:0001188.definition: An efficacy of epitope intervention experiment that tests the ability of inducing an epitope immune response to increase the severity of an existing disease in the host.

OBI:0001184.label: epitope protection experiment
OBI:0001184.definition: An efficacy of epitope intervention experiment that tests the efficacy of inducing an immune epitope response to prevent disease in a host.

OBI:0001488.label: epitope tolerance induction experiment
OBI:0001488.definition: An efficacy of epitope intervention experiment that tests the ability of the intervention to decrease an existing immune response

OBI:0001190.label: epitope treatment experiment
OBI:0001190.definition: An epitope intervention experiment that tests the ability of inducing an epitope immune response to treat an existing disease  in the host.

OBI:0001186.label: epitope protection from infectious challenge experiment based on pathogen burden
OBI:0001186.definition: An epitope protection from infectious challenge experiment in which the readout is a reduction in the presence of pathogens in the host compared to controls.

OBI:0001566.label: 50% dissociation of binding temperature (Tm)
OBI:0001566.definition: A binding datum that specifies the temperature at which half of the binding partners are forming a complex and the other half are unbound.

OBI:0001182.label: negative binding datum
OBI:0001182.definition: A binding datum that states that there is no significant disposition of two or more entities to form a complex

OBI:0001144.label: binding constant
OBI:0001144.definition: A binding datum about the disposition of two or more material entities to form complexes which comes in the form of a scalar and unit that are utilized in equations that model the binding process

OBI:0001189.label: epitope protection experiment based on survival
OBI:0001189.definition: An epitope protection experiment that determines the success of the epitope intervention based on increased survival of the host.

OBI:0001179.label: epitope protection from infectious challenge experiment
OBI:0001179.definition: An epitope protection experiment in which the ability of the epitope to protect the host from an infection is assessed.

OBI:0001183.label: epitope protection from tumor challenge experiment
OBI:0001183.definition: An epitope protection experiment in which the ability of the epitope to protect the host from developing tumors is assessed.

OBI:0001487.label: B cell epitope specific immune intervention
OBI:0001487.definition: An epitope specific immune intervention in which the induced response targets a B cell epitope

OBI:0001471.label: T cell epitope specific immune intervention
OBI:0001471.definition: An epitope specific immune intervention in which the induced response targets a T cell epitope

OBI:0001814.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells
OBI:0001814.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001813.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells
OBI:0001813.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001811.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells
OBI:0001811.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001382.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells
OBI:0001382.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001806.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells
OBI:0001806.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-27 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:1110156.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:1110156.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:1110170.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:1110170.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001220.label: cell culture analyte detection bioassay measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:0001220.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses a cell culture analyte detection bioassay.

OBI:0001297.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:0001297.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001367.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:0001367.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:1110177.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells
OBI:1110177.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-10 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001236.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells
OBI:0001236.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001821.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells
OBI:0001821.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001577.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific intracellular cytokine staining (ICS) IL-22 production by T cells
OBI:0001577.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001279.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells
OBI:0001279.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001496.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells
OBI:0001496.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001359.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells
OBI:0001359.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001800.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells
OBI:0001800.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001457.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells
OBI:0001457.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001801.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells
OBI:0001801.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001609.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells
OBI:0001609.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-8 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:1110154.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:1110154.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001455.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:0001455.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001273.label: cell culture analyte detection bioassay measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:0001273.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses a cell culture analyte detection bioassay.

OBI:0001289.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:0001289.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001255.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:0001255.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001299.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells
OBI:0001299.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-5 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001222.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific RANTES production by T cells
OBI:0001222.definition: An assay of epitope specific RANTES production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001790.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific RANTES production by T cells
OBI:0001790.definition: An assay of epitope specific RANTES production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001412.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific RANTES production by T cells
OBI:0001412.definition: An assay of epitope specific RANTES production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001325.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific RANTES production by T cells
OBI:0001325.definition: An assay of epitope specific RANTES production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001789.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific RANTES production by T cells
OBI:0001789.definition: An assay of epitope specific RANTES production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:1110157.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:1110157.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001206.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:0001206.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001341.label: cell culture analyte detection bioassay measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:0001341.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses a cell culture analyte detection bioassay.

OBI:0001490.label: cytometric bead array measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:0001490.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001357.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:0001357.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001303.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells
OBI:0001303.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001346.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells
OBI:0001346.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001826.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells
OBI:0001826.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001601.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific intracellular cytokine staining (ICS) IL-21 production by T cells
OBI:0001601.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001298.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells
OBI:0001298.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001342.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells
OBI:0001342.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-21 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001288.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific lymphotoxin A production by T cells
OBI:0001288.definition: An assay of epitope specific lymphotoxin A production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:1110155.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific tumor necrosis factor production by T cells
OBI:1110155.definition: A T cell epitope specific tumor necrosis factor production assay that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001221.label: ChIP-chip by SNP array assay
OBI:0001221.definition: A ChIP-ChIP assay in which immunoprecipitated chromatin is run on a SNP array to detect polymorphism specific DNA elements in the isolated chromatin

OBI:0001419.label: ChIP-chip by tiling array assay
OBI:0001419.definition: A ChIP-ChIP assay in which immunoprecipitated chromatin is run on a tiling array that covers stretches of DNA to to detect which elements in those stretches are present in the isolated chromatin

OBI:0002014.label: DNA methylation profiling by ChIP-chip assay
OBI:0002014.definition: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies sites of DNA methylation using ChIP-chip technologies.

OBI:0002016.label: histone modification identification by ChIP-chip assay
OBI:0002016.definition: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies regions containing specific histones and their modifications using ChIP-chip techniques.

OBI:1110159.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells
OBI:1110159.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:1110171.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells
OBI:1110171.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001349.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells
OBI:0001349.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001542.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells
OBI:0001542.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001309.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells
OBI:0001309.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001238.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells
OBI:0001238.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001797.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells
OBI:0001797.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001532.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells
OBI:0001532.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001799.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells
OBI:0001799.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001798.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells
OBI:0001798.definition: An assay of epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001231.label: ELISA measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001231.definition: An assay of epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001194.label: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001194.definition: An assay of epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses an ELISPOT assay.

OBI:0001270.label: cell culture analyte detection bioassay measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001270.definition: An assay of epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses a cell culture analyte detection bioassay.

OBI:0001210.label: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001210.definition: An assay of epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses a cytometric bead array assay.

OBI:0001203.label: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001203.definition: An assay of epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses a detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay.

OBI:0001482.label: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific transforming growth factor-beta production by T cells
OBI:0001482.definition: An assay of epitope specifictransforming growth factor-beta production by T cells that uses an intracellular cytokine staining assay.

OBI:0001810.label: biological activity assay measuring epitope specific granulysin release by T cells
OBI:0001810.definition: A T cell epitope specific cytotoxic T cell degranulation assay that detects granulysin release by T cells.

OBI:0001809.label: biological activity assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

OBI:0002044.label: RNA Bind-n-Seq assay
OBI:0002044.definition: An RNA-seq assay that comprehensively characterizes sequence and structural specificity of RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

OBI:0002143.label: bromouride labeling and sequencing after UV exposure
OBI:0002143.definition: An RNA-seq assay to identify transcription start sites and active enhancer elements through isolation of bromouridine (Bru) labelled RNAs after UV light exposure introduces transcription-blocking lesions.

OBI:0002113.label: bromouridine labeling and sequencing assay
OBI:0002113.definition: An RNA-seq assay to identify spans of nascent transcription in the genome through isolation of recent bromouridine (Bru) labelled RNAs.

OBI:0002114.label: bromouridine pulse-chase and sequencing assay
OBI:0002114.definition: An RNA-seq assay to identify RNA populations of specific ages through isolation of RNAs first labelled with bromouridine (Bru) followed by chasing in uridine for different periods of time.

OBI:0002575.label: isoform sequencing
OBI:0002575.definition: A method for sequencing isoforms by enriching a cDNA library for full-length reads spanning entire transcript isoforms.

OBI:0002045.label: poly(A)-site sequencing assay
OBI:0002045.definition: A RNA-seq assay that quantitatively profiles RNA polyadenylation at the transcriptome level.

OBI:0002572.label: polyA-depleted RNA sequencing assay
OBI:0002572.definition: An RNA-seq assay to study non-polyadenylated transcripts, such as, but not exclusive to unspliced and circular isoforms, through the depletion of polyadenylated transcripts prior to high-throughput sequencing.

OBI:0002571.label: polyA-selected RNA sequencing assay
OBI:0002571.definition: An RNA-seq assay to study transcriptomes through the enrichment of polyadenylated transcripts or removal of ribosomal RNA prior to high-throughput sequencing.

OBI:0002457.label: precision nuclear run-on sequencing assay
OBI:0002457.definition: An RNA-seq assay that maps the genome-wide distribution of transcriptionally-engaged Pol II at base-pair resolution by using biotin-labeled ribonucleotide triphosphate analogs (biotin-NTP) for nuclear run-on reactions, allowing the efficient affinity purification of nascent RNAs for high throughput sequencing from their 3' ends.
alternative_term: precision nuclear run-on and sequencing assay

OBI:0002038.label: ribosomal profiling by sequencing assay
OBI:0002038.definition: A RNA-seq assay that sequences only mRNA protected by the ribosome during translation.

OBI:0002041.label: self-transcribing active regulatory region sequencing assay
OBI:0002041.definition: An RNA-seq assay that identifies the sequences that act as transcriptional enhancers in a direct, quantitative, and genome-wide manner from sheared genomic DNA.

OBI:0002112.label: small RNA sequencing assay
OBI:0002112.definition: An RNA-seq assay which is targeting small RNA (< 200 bp) sequences such as, but not exclusive to, miRNAs using, for example, small RNA library preparation kits.

OBI:0002034.label: transcript leader sequencing assay
OBI:0002034.definition: An RNA-seq assay that combines enzymatic capture of m(7)G-capped mRNA 5' ends with high-throughput sequencing.

OBI:0002033.label: translation-associated transcript leader sequencing assay
OBI:0002033.definition: An RNA-seq assay that combines TL-seq with polysome fractionation

OBI:0001557.label: material storage service
OBI:0001557.definition: A storage service in which a service consumer provides some material as input which a service provider stores and returns as output.

OBI:0001547.label: material analysis service
OBI:0001547.definition: A service in which a service consumer provides some input material and a service provider performs some analysis of this material to generate data that is returned to the service consumer.

OBI:0001515.label: material maintenance service
OBI:0001515.definition: A material processing service in which a service provider makes physical modifications to a specified input material, such that at least one of the specified outputs of this process is a modified version of a specified input material.

OBI:0001563.label: material processing service
OBI:0001563.definition: A service in which a service provider makes physical changes to a specified input material entity with the objective of producing a new material entity form input materials, or modifying the input material entity, and returning this as output to the service consumer.

OBI:0001580.label: material transport service
OBI:0001580.definition: A service in which a service provider facilitates the transport of some material entity to a specified destination for the service consumer.

OBI:0001529.label: data analysis service
OBI:0001529.definition: A service in which a service consumer provides some input data and a service provider transforms, models, or interprets the input data and returns this generated data as output.

OBI:0001598.label: data maintenance service
OBI:0001598.definition: A maintenance service in which a service provider actively manages or maintains data or a database for the service consumer.  Maintenance of the data is performed to maintain its integrity or enhance its quality or utility for the consumer, but new data is not generated as a result of the maintenance.

OBI:0001533.label: data storage service
OBI:0001533.definition: A storage service in which a service consumer provides data as input which a service provider stores and returns as output in its original form.

GO:0001047.label: core promoter binding
GO:0001047.definition: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with the regulatory region composed of the transcription start site and binding sites for the basal transcription machinery. Binding may occur as a sequence specific interaction or as an interaction observed only once a factor has been recruited to the DNA by other factors.

OBI:0001702.label: immunoglobulin binding to epitope
OBI:0001702.definition: a process of an immunoglobulin complex binding to a material entity at the immunoglobulin complementarity determining region (CDR).

GO:0019904.label: protein domain specific binding
GO:0019904.definition: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with a specific domain of a protein.

GO:0043565.label: sequence-specific DNA binding
GO:0043565.definition: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with DNA of a specific nucleotide composition, e.g. GC-rich DNA binding, or with a specific sequence motif or type of DNA e.g. promotor binding or rDNA binding.

OBI:1110057.label: MHC:epitope complex binding to TCR
OBI:1110057.definition: a process of an MHC molecule binding to an entity playing the role of epitope to create an MHC:epitope complex which is then bound by a TCR molecule.

OBI:0002172.label: Northwestern blot assay
OBI:0002172.definition: A direct binding assay that detects interactions of labeled RNA with immobilized protein on a membrane.

OBI:0002173.label: Southwestern blot assay
OBI:0002173.definition: A direct binding assay that detects interactions of labeled DNA with immobilized protein on a membrane.

OBI:0001699.label: antibody cross-blocking assay
OBI:0001699.definition: A competitive inhibition of binding assay in which two antibodies that are known to bind the same antigen are tested for the ability of one antibody to inhibit binding of the other antibody to the antigen, thereby determining if they have overlapping binding sites.

OBI:0001521.definition: An assay of epitope specific granulocyte colony stimulating factor production by T cells that uses an ELISA.

OBI:0001900.definition: A specimen identifier which is assigned by a specimen repository

OBI:0002116.definition: An analytical chromatography assay that utilizes a high performance liquid chromatography instrument for separation of compounts in a solution.

OBI:0002174.label: immunocytochemistry
OBI:0002174.definition: An immuno staining assay in which samples of intact cells are examined that have had most, if not all, of their surrounding extracellular matrix removed

OBI:0001986.label: immunohistochemistry
OBI:0001986.definition: An immunostaining assay to detect and potentially localize antigens within the cells of a tissue section.

OBI:0001485.label: purified MHC molecule preparation
OBI:0001485.definition: A mixture containing MHC molecules that was purified to remove non-MHC molecular entities.

OBI:0001998.label: immunohistochemistry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex
OBI:0001998.definition: A B cell epitope qualitative binding to antibody assay that uses an immunohistochemistry assay.

OBI:0001682.label: bacterial one-hybrid assay
OBI:0001682.definition: An assay that identifies the sequence-specific target site of a DNA-binding domain. In this system, a given transcription factor (TF) is expressed as a fusion to a subunit of RNA polymerase. In parallel, a library of randomized oligonucleotides representing potential TF target sequences, is cloned into a separate vector containing the selectable genes HIS3 and URA3. If the DNA-binding domain (bait) binds a potential DNA target site (prey) in vivo, it will recruit RNA polymerase to the promoter and activate transcription of the reporter genes in that clone. The two reporter genes, HIS3 and URA3, allow for positive and negative selections, respectively. At the end of the process, positive clones are sequenced and examined with motif-finding tools in order to resolve the favoured DNA target sequence

OBI:0001683.label: chromosome organization assay by fluorescence in-situ hybridization
OBI:0001683.definition: An in-situ hybridization assay that uses fluorescence to detect chromosomal integrity

OBI:0002085.label: transcript expression location detection by hybridization chain reaction assay
OBI:0002085.definition: An in situ hybridization assay in which the location (e.g. anatomical/tissue) of a transcript is detected by a multiplexed fluorescent in situ hybridization, based on orthogonal amplification with hybridization chain reactions (HCR). RNA probes complementary to mRNA targets trigger chain reactions in which fluorophore-labeled RNA hairpins self-assemble into tethered fluorescent amplification polymers.
alternative_term: transcript expression location detection by fluorescent HCR.

OBI:0002043.definition: A cross-linking immunoprecipitation high-throughput sequencing assay that identifies protein-RNA interactions using UV light to covalently bind proteins and RNA molecules, allowing for a very stringent purification of the linked protein-RNA complexes.

OBI:0002013.label: nCounter Human miRNA Expression array
OBI:0002013.definition: A human array which is manufacutred by NanoString Technologies. Built upon color-coded molecular barcodes technology, the array profiles miRNA with increased specificity and sensitivty than microarrays.

OBI:0002570.label: nCounter Mouse miRNA Expression array
OBI:0002570.definition: A mouse array which is manufacutred by NanoString Technologies. Built upon color-coded molecular barcodes technology, the array profiles miRNA with increased specificity and sensitivty than microarrays.

OBI:0001869.label: Illumina BeadChip
OBI:0001869.definition: An array that consists of 3-micron silica beads that self assemble in microwells on either of two materials: fiber optic bundles or planar silica slides.

OBI:0400147.label: microarray
OBI:0400147.definition: A processed material that is made to be used in an analyte assay. It consists of a physical immobilisation matrix in which substances that bind the analyte are placed in regular spatial position.

CLO:0000001.label: cell line cell
CLO:0000001.definition: A cultured cell that is part of a cell line - a stable and homogeneous population of cells with a common biological origin and propagation history in culture

OBI:0000877.label: cell line immortalization
OBI:0000877.definition: an establishing cell line process whereby a mortal cell line is intentionally genetically modified to be capable of indefinite propagation and re-established as a new immortal cell line
alternative_term: 'establishing immortal cell line through directed genetic modification'

OBI:0000867.label: establishing cancer cell line
OBI:0000867.definition: is a planned process in which the objective is to generate a cell line from a natural population of cancer cells which are already immortal

OBI:0002006.label: 1M-Duo Infinium HD BeadChip
OBI:0002006.definition: A BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array integrates ~ 1 million markers per sample for genotyping, and copy number variation (CNV) and Cytogenetic analysis.

OBI:0002130.label: Illumina Infinium Omni5Exome-4 Kit
OBI:0002130.definition: An Illumina BeadChip which is an array that interrogates over 4.3 million whole-genome variants for genotyping and copy number variation.

OBI:0001870.label: Illumina methylation BeadChip
OBI:0001870.definition: A BeadChip made for an analyte assay that generates information about DNA methylation.

OBI:0002005.label: Methylation 27K BeadChip
OBI:0002005.definition: A methylation BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array interrogates ~ 27,000 CpG sites per sample at single-nucleotide resolution.

OBI:0002004.label: Methylation 450K BeadChip
OBI:0002004.definition: A methylation BeadChip which is manufactured by the Illumina corporation. Built upon BeadChip tehcnology, the array interrogates ~ 485,000 methylation sites per sample at single-nucleotide resolution.

OBI:0002131.label: Illumina Infinium MethylationEPIC BeadChip
OBI:0002131.definition: An Illumina methylation BeadChip which is an array that interrogates ~ 850,000 methylation sites per sample at single-nucleotide resolution.

OBI:1110106.label: cultured antigen presenting cell population
OBI:1110106.definition: a cell culture including cells that have an antigen presentation function

OBI:1110107.label: cultured effector T cell population
OBI:1110107.definition: A cell culture including cells that have an effector T cell function

OBI:1110047.label: cultured CD3+ T cell population
OBI:1110047.definition: A T cell population characterized by expressing the CD3 molecule on its surface.

OBI:1110048.label: cultured CD3- T cell population
OBI:1110048.definition: A T cell population characterized by not expressing the CD3 molecule on its surface.

OBI:1110050.label: cultured CD4- T cell population
OBI:1110050.definition: A T cell population characterized by not expressing the CD4 molecule on its surface.

OBI:1110051.label: cultured CD8- T cell population
OBI:1110051.definition: A T cell population characterized by not expressing the CD8 molecule on its surface.

OBI:1110044.label: cultured PBMC cell population
OBI:1110044.definition: A mixed cell population obtained by processing whole blood. The cells are characterized by having a similar density and are largely mononuclear cells (includes T cells, B cells, and other cell types).

OBI:0001911.label: cell line culture
OBI:0001911.definition: A cell culture comprised of cell line cells and the media in which they are being actively propagated or quiescently stored.

OBI:0001910.label: primary cell culture
OBI:0001910.definition: A cell culture comprised of primary cultured cells and the media in which they are being actively propaged or quiescently stored.

OBI:0000992.label: DNA sequencing service
OBI:0000992.definition: A DNA sequencing  process provided as a service - which is the realization of some DNA sequencing in which the service provider role is realized.

CLO:0000031.label: cell line
CLO:0000031.definition: A cultured cell population that represents a genetically stable and homogenous population of cultured cells that shares a common propagation history (i.e. has been successively passaged together in culture).

OBI:0001921.label: RNA-binding protein immunoprecipitation tiling array profiling assay
OBI:0001921.definition: An RNA-binding protein immunoprecipitation array profiling assay that combines immunoprecipitation of an RNA-binding protein and RNA tiling array to identify mRNAs associated with selected RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

OBI:0002042.label: carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay followed by sequencing assay
OBI:0002042.definition: A carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay to analyze the organization of chromosomes in an unbiased, genome-wide manner using high throughput sequening following carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture.
alternative_term: Carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay followed by sequencing

OBI:0002142.label: Nanostring nCounter miRNA expression assay
OBI:0002142.definition: A microRNA profiling assay using digital molecular barcoding technology to quantify target microRNA molecules without the need for amplification.

OBI:0001335.label: microRNA profiling by array assay
OBI:0001335.definition: An assay that analyses the microRNA component of the transcriptome using a microRNA array.

OBI:0001922.label: microRNA profiling by high throughput sequencing assay
OBI:0001922.definition: A microRNA profiling assay that analyzes the microRNA component of the transcriptome using high throughput sequencing technology.

OBI:0600008.label: acquisition
OBI:0600008.definition: the planned process of gaining possession of a continuant

OBI:0600004.label: human subject enrollment
OBI:0600004.definition: A planned process with the objective to obtain a population of human subjects to participate in an investigation by determining eligibility of subjects and obtaining informed consent.

OBI:0002326.label: International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics cervical cancer stage value specification
OBI:0002326.definition: A categorical value specification that is an assessment of the stage of a gynecologic cancer according to the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics (FIGO) staging systems.

OBI:0002341.label: International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics ovarian cancer stage value specification
OBI:0002341.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of ovarian cancer following the rules of the FIGO classification system.
alternative_term: Pathologic Tumor Stage Grouping for ovarian cancer (FIGO)

OBI:0002314.label: clinical tumor stage group according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002314.definition: A categorical value specification that is an assessment of the stage of a cancer according to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) v7 staging systems.

OBI:0002205.label: histologic grade according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002205.definition: A categorical value specification that is a histologic grade assigned to a tumor slide specimen according to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) 7th Edition grading system.

OBI:0002210.label: histologic grade according to the Fuhrman Nuclear Grading System
OBI:0002210.definition: A categorical value specification that is a histologic grade assigned to a tumor slide specimen according to the Fuhrman Nuclear Grading System.

OBI:0002215.label: histologic grade for ovarian tumor
OBI:0002215.definition: A categorical value specification that is a histologic grade assigned to a ovarian tumor.

OBI:0002290.label: pathologic distant metastases stage for colon according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002290.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of colon cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases. TNM pathologic distant metastasis findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.

OBI:0002306.label: pathologic distant metastases stage for kidney according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002306.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of renal cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases. TNM pathologic distant metastasis findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.

OBI:0002298.label: pathologic distant metastases stage for lung according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002298.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of lung cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases. TNM pathologic distant metastasis findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.

OBI:0002310.label: pathologic distant metastases stage for ovary according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002310.definition: A categorical value specification that is a  pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of ovarian cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases. TNM pathologic distant metastasis findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.

OBI:0002270.label: pathologic lymph node stage for colon and rectum according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002270.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of colorectal cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.
alternative_term: pN: Pathologic spread colon lymph nodes (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002284.label: pathologic lymph node stage for kidney according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002284.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of renal cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.
alternative_term: pN: Pathologic spread kidney lymph nodes (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002279.label: pathologic lymph node stage for lung according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002279.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of lung cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.
alternative_term: pN: Pathologic spread colon lymph nodes (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002287.label: pathologic lymph node stage for ovary according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002287.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of ovarian cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.
alternative_term: pN: Pathologic spread ovarian lymph nodes (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002224.label: pathologic primary tumor stage for colon and rectum according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002224.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of colorectal cancer following the rules of the TNM American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) version 7 classification system as they pertain to staging of the primary tumor. TNM pathologic primary tumor findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.
alternative_term: pT: Pathologic spread colorectal primary tumor (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002243.label: pathologic primary tumor stage for kidney according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002243.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of renal cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of the primary tumor. TNM pathologic primary tumor findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.
alternative_term: pT: Pathologic spread kidney primary tumor (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002232.label: pathologic primary tumor stage for lung according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002232.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of lung cancer following the rules of the TNM American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) version 7 classification system as they pertain to staging of the primary tumor. TNM pathologic primary tumor findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.
alternative_term: pT: Pathologic spread lung primary tumor (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002256.label: pathologic primary tumor stage for ovary according to AJCC 7th edition
OBI:0002256.definition: A categorical value specification that is a pathologic finding about one or more characteristics of ovarian cancer following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of the primary tumor. TNM pathologic primary tumor findings are based on clinical findings supplemented by histopathologic examination of one or more tissue specimens acquired during surgery.
alternative_term: pT: Pathologic spread ovarian primary tumor (AJCC 7th Edition)

OBI:0002356.label: performance status value specification
OBI:0002356.definition: A categorical value specification that is an assessment of a participant's performance status (general well-being and activities of daily life).

OBI:0001929.label: mass value specification
OBI:0001929.definition: A value specification that specifies the mass of some thing.

OBI:0001930.label: categorical value specification
OBI:0001930.definition: A value specification that is specifies one category out of a fixed number of nominal categories

OBI:0001931.label: scalar value specification
OBI:0001931.definition: A value specification that consists of two parts: a numeral and a unit label

OBI:0002137.label: RNA Integrity Number value specification
OBI:0002137.definition: A value specification that specifies the value of the RNA Integrity Number as a real value between 1 (most degraded) and 10 (most intact).

OBI:0002557.label: maximum age value specification
OBI:0002557.definition: A value specifcation that specifies the oldest age when specifying an age range.

OBI:0002556.label: minimum age value specification
OBI:0002556.definition: A value specifcation that specifies the youngest age when specifying an age range.

OBI:0002138.label: temperature value specification
OBI:0002138.definition: A value specification that specifies the temperature of some thing.

OBI:0002139.label: volume value specification
OBI:0002139.definition: A value specification that specifies the volume of some thing.

OBI:0001935.label: predicted mass value
OBI:0001935.definition: A predicted value where the prediction specifies the mass of some thing.

OBI:0000788.label: fluorescently labeled MHC multimer
OBI:0000788.definition: A complex of two or more linked MHC molecules including a fluorescent label that can be loaded with a ligand, and is used in flow cytometry assay to bind to T cell receptors of T cells specific for the ligand

OBI:0000839.label: labeled oligonucleotide
OBI:0000839.definition: a labeled oligonucleotide is a short nucleic acid which underwent a labeling process resulting in a radioactive isotope such as P32 or P33 added to its backbone for instance by end labeling with polynucleotide kinase which added radiolabeled ATP to the 5' end of oligonucleotide

OBI:0001941.label: contig N50
OBI:0001941.definition: N50 statistic computed for the contigs produced by the assembly process. A contig N50 is calculated by first ordering every contig by length from longest to shortest. Next, starting from the longest contig, the lengths of each contig are summed, until this running sum equals one-half of the total length of all contigs in the assembly. The contig N50 of the assembly is the length of the shortest contig in this list.

OBI:0001945.label: scaffold N50
OBI:0001945.definition: N50 statistic computed for the scaffold produced by the assembly process. The method for computing the value is similar to that of contig N50 but uses scaffold information instead of contig information

OBI:0001952.label: flash freezing
OBI:0001952.definition: A freezing process by which material entities are quickly frozen by subjecting them to cryogenic temperatures, or in direct contact with Liquid nitrogen at -320.8F or -196°C.

OBI:0001248.label: ChIP-chip assay
OBI:0001248.definition: An assay in which chromatin is immunoprecipitated and subsequently analyzed using a DNA microarray to identify which parts of DNA are part of the isolated chromatin

OBI:0002169.label: ChIP-qPCR assay
OBI:0002169.definition: A ChIP assay that uses quantitative PCR to determine levels of specific DNA in immunoprecipitated samples.

OBI:0000716.label: ChIP-seq assay
OBI:0000716.definition: An assay in which chromatin is immunoprecipitated and subsequently analyzed using a DNA sequencing step to identify which parts of DNA are part of the isolated chromatin

OBI:0001974.label: Ion 314 Chip v2
OBI:0001974.definition:
